articles.author: Francesca Chambers
articles.title: Biden pardons marijuana possession convictions; federal, D.C. crimes - USA TODAY
articles.description: President Joe Biden announced he's pardoning every American who has used marijuana in the past, including those who were never arrested or prosecuted.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON President Joe Biden announced Friday he's issuing a federal pardon to every American who has used marijuana in the past, including those who were never arrested or prosecuted.
